Description: Tiraz fragment woven in silk and decorated with three parallel bands bearing stylised vegetal interlacing and stylised animal (?) motifs in medallions, in red , blue and yellow silk. Warp: silk, undyed, S, 16/cm Weft: silk, undyed, S, 11-12/cm Weft: silk, yellow, blue and red, S, 80/cm
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj William Joseph Myers (executors of)
